data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Jamtara.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jamtara, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Jamtara, Jharkhand, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Jamtara that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Jamtara, Jharkhand, India will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Sardar (Muslim traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Sardar (Muslim traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Sardar (Muslim traditions) people is yours.
Father, it’s possible most of the 772,702 lost people in  Jamtara, Jharkhand, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Jamtara, Jharkhand, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jamtara, Jharkhand, India has a population of 791,000.

We estimate Jamtara has 8,701 people who might know Jesus, 9,597 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 772,702 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Jamtara to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Jamtara
location.people_groups_list: Angarok, Bagti, Kori, Gandharb (Hindu traditions), Halwai Maira
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Angarok (6,700), Bagti (200), Kori (2,575,000), Gandharb (Hindu traditions) (15,000), Halwai Maira (124,000)
